output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the total supply, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary large amount of tokens, devaluing the token.
The transfer function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the recipient's balance, allowing a user to overflow the recipient's balance and take control of arbitrary funds.
The transferFrom function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the recipient's balance, allowing a user to overflow the recipient's balance and take control of arbitrary funds.
The approve function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the allowance, allowing the owner to set the allowance to a very large value, draining funds from the approved user.
The approveAndCall function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the allowance, allowing the owner to set the allowance to a very large value, draining funds from the approved user.
